No. F. 22(7)/2017-Legis.—The following Act of Majlis-e-Shoora 
(Parliament) received the assent of the President on the 27th December, 2017 is 
hereby Published for general information:— 
Acr NO. XXXLX OF 2017 
AN 
ACT 
further to amend the Rulers of Acceding States (Abolition of Privy Purses 
and Privileges) Order, 1972 
WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the Rulers of Acceding States 
(Abolition of Privy Purses and Privileges) Order, 1972 (P.O. No. 15 of 1972), for 
the purposes hereinafter appearing; 
(1607) 
Price : Rs. 2.00 
[2226(2017)/Ex. Gaz.] 
1608 	THE GAZE! lb OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., DEC. 31, 2017 	[PART I 
It is hereby enacted as follows:- 
Short title and commencement.—(1) This Act may be called the 
Rulers of Acceding States (Abolition of Privy Purses and Privileges) (Amendment) 
Act, 2017. 
(2) 	It shall come into force at once. 
Amendment of Article 5, Order 15 of 1972.—In the Rulers of 
Acceding States (Abolition of Privy Purses and Privileges) Order, 1972 (P.O. No. 
15 of 1972), in Article 5, after clause (2), the following new clause shall be added, 
namely:— 
"(3) Notwithstanding anything contained in clause (1) and subject to 
clause (2), the Federal Government may, for reasons to be recorded 
in writing, increase maintenance allowance of a Ruler or, as the case 
may be, a dependent of a Ruler.". 
TAHIR HUSSAIN, 
Secretary.
